author: COMSOL
description: This example simulates the space charge limited emission of electrons from a planar surface. The electric potential distribution is compared to the analytic solution based on Child's Law, as is the total emission current from the emission surface.
label: childs_law_benchmark.mph
name: root

settings.description: Use piecewise polynomial recovery on field
settings.name: UsePPR

settings.description: Store extra time steps for wall interactions
settings.name: StoreExtra

settings.description: Maximum number of wall interactions per time step
settings.name: MaxBounce

settings.description: Maximum number of consecutive null collisions
settings.name: MaxNullCollision

settings.description: Avoid inverted elements by curving interior domain elements
settings.name: curvedinterior

description: Initial values of variables solved for
settings.name: useinitsol

description: Values of variables not solved for
settings.name: usesol
